channel.title: Project DungeonFest ip change?
channel.description: sorry for my stupidity, but where do I change the server ip for the Project DungeonFest source? Any help is appreciated :D

item.title: Project DungeonFest ip change?
item.dc:creator: @Legionscape669 Legionscape669
item.description:
@Legionscape669 wrote:

ik im grave digging but im helping!, what he said above ^^ is nearly right you need to go into client folder search for clientsettings.java and the code you will encounter in the first 30 lines is public static final String ip = "127.0.0.1"; public static final int port = 43594; public static final String background_music_name = "Scape Original"; //rs classic music <3 public static final String serverName = "Luminosity"; //server name, also auto changes client title and load bar public static final String websiteLink = "luminosity667.smfnew.com"; //so it goes ur website instead of rs, example on acc creation terms service button public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black; //Color.black default public static final boolean disable_server_list = false; //dont disable this :D, ofc you may but then serverlist doesnt work anymore public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true; //containers table information check but ppl give weird names for stuff as: "ukeys" public static final boolean disable_keys_request = true; //if this true, disable_ukeys_check has to be true too, when this true, you can load client without connecting server all you need to do is edit the “127.0.0.1” & the server_name … to wat ever yo uwant. hope i helped feel free to rep me.

Read full topic

item.title: Project DungeonFest ip change?
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

Simple, go to client.java in your client folder, do CTRL+F and search for server
Keep pressing Enter until you see server ip = [something]
Change those numbers to the ip you want, I may have got it wrong, it’s usually at 127.0.0.1 (local) or 0.0.0.0
I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Project DungeonFest ip change?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:2, topic:411040”]Cient class [In the client]

Use CTRL+F, and search for “Server =”.[/quote]
P.S. Don’t tell someone to open a file with the class extension, tell someone to open a class.

Read full topic
